channel.title: 2025-03-06s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-03-06s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Process-based Self-Rewarding Language Models
item.description: Process-based Self-Rewarding advances LLMs, surpassing human reasoning in math by step-wise self-evaluation.

item.title: KodCode: A Diverse, Challenging, and Verifiable Synthetic Dataset for Coding
item.description: KODCODE: A new synthetic coding dataset with verified solutions and tests, enabling state-of-the-art performance for coding LLMs.

item.title: QE4PE: Word-level Quality Estimation for Human Post-Editing
item.description: QE4PE: Word-level QE’s impact on MT post-editing with 42 pro-editors across English-Italian/Dutch is investigated. Usability&accuracy challenges in professional workflows are underlined.

item.title: CognitiveDrone: A VLA Model and Evaluation Benchmark for Real-Time Cognitive Task Solving and Reasoning in UAVs
item.description: CognitiveDrone: A novel VLA model and benchmark for real-time cognitive UAV tasks, improving reasoning and control.

item.title: CrowdSelect: Synthetic Instruction Data Selection with Multi-LLM Wisdom
item.description: CROWDSELECT boosts instruction tuning by cleverly selecting synthetic data using multi-LLM wisdom, enhancing model performance across diverse tasks.

item.title: Fine-Tuning Small Language Models for Domain-Specific AI: An Edge AI Perspective
item.description: Shakti SLMs: Fine-tuning compact language models for efficient, domain-specific AI on edge devices.

item.title: Babel: Open Multilingual Large Language Models Serving Over 90% of Global Speakers
item.description: Babel: An open multilingual LLM supports over 90% of global speakers, filling the language coverage gap and setting new performance standards.

item.title: Interact, Instruct to Improve: A LLM-Driven Parallel Actor-Reasoner Framework for Enhancing Autonomous Vehicle Interactions
item.description: LLM-driven framework enhances autonomous vehicle interactions with human drivers in real-time.

item.title: Mixture of Structural-and-Textual Retrieval over Text-rich Graph Knowledge Bases
item.description: MoR: Adaptive knowledge retrieval by fusing structural and textual data for better question answering.

item.title: Exploring Rewriting Approaches for Different Conversational Tasks
item.description: Rewriting method is critical to conversational assistant effectiveness.
